item.title: Survey response 005
item.description: Postcode: SW2 5AL Tenancy: Private rented Provider: PRS Duration of problem: Two years and then landlord installed double glazing. We still have to make sure we keep windows open and use a dehumifidier as the issue comes from the fact the house is old and not properly insulator (as confirmed by a contractor who inspected the house) Problem type: Damp and mould (both ongoing) Have you contacted anyone for help with these problems?
